amendment.description: To amend the program under part E of title II to ensure increased access to science, technology, engineering, and mathematics subject fields for underrepresented students, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2108 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2108 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Gillibrand to Amendment SA 2089. (consideration: CR S4922-4923; text: CR S4923) To amend the program under part E of title II to ensure increased access to science, technology, engineering, and mathematics subject fields for underrepresented students, and for other purposes.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2108 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2108 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Gillibrand to Amendment SA 2089.
